00223 class ScanlineAccessor {
00224     public:
00229         ScanlineAccessor(VirtualDisplay* display, XYDIM x, XYDIM y, XYDIM width) :
00230             m_data((UINT16 GDI_HUGE*)display->GetBitmap()->GetBits()),
00231             m_count(width)
00232         {
00233             m_data += (display->GetScanlineAtomCount() >> 1) * y + x;
00234         }
00235 
00237         BOOLEAN HasNext() { return (m_count > 0); };
00238 
00240         void Draw(UINT8 red, UINT8 green, UINT8 blue)
00241         {
00242             *m_data = ((ColorValue)((((red) >> 3U) << 11U) | (((green) >> 2U) << 5U) | ((blue) >> 3U)));
00243             
00244             #if defined(APOXI_DISPLAY_FORMAT_BIG_ENDIAN)
00245                 *m_data = ((*m_data & 0xffU) << 8U) | ((*m_data & 0xff00U)) >> 8U;
00246             #endif
00247             m_data++;
00248             m_count--;
00249         }
00250         
00251         void Draw(ColorValue cv)
00252         {
00253             *m_data = cv;
00254             m_data++;
00255             m_count--;
00256         }
00257 
00261         void Next() {
00262             m_data++;
00263             m_count--;
00264         }
00265 
00266     private:
00268         UINT16 GDI_HUGE* m_data;
00270         XYDIM m_count;
00271         
00272 };
